channel.title: Slayer Help!

item.title: Slayer Help!
item.dc:creator: @toxic-x toxic-x
item.description:
@toxic-x wrote:

Okay so for some reason i can only open the shop to duradel(slayer master) i cannot get a task from him any ideas on how to make him give you a task? this is what i have in my clicking buttons

case 9157:
c.getShops().openShop(48);
break;

also have this in clicking buttons

case 9178:
if(c.teleAction == 200) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(2839, 5296, 6, “modern”);
break;
}
if(c.dialogueAction == 38) {
Slayer.assignNewTask©;
}
else if(c.dialogueAction == 90) {
c.getPA().removeAllWindows();
c.checkEmpty();
c.getDungeoneering().Dung©;

Read full topic
